price: ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߊߟߎ߫ ߟߊߞߛߌ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߏ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߢߊߣߌ߲ߞߏ ߓߍ߯ ߘߐ߫، ߊߟߎ߫ ߘߌ߫ ߓߊ߲߫ ߕߎ߲߯ ߞߊ߬ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ߬ߜߙߊ ߟߐ߬ ߊ߬ ߡߊ߬
arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهُ يُنَجِّيكُم مِّنۡهَا وَمِن كُلِّ كَرۡبٖ ثُمَّ أَنتُمۡ تُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: quli al-lahu yunajjīkum min'hā wamin kulli karbin thumma antum tush'rikūna
